Adreson,  
You most likely are not aware that I designed a typeface a couple of years ago called "Align" with a "g". The spelling is different but could still cause some confusion.

[http://typophile.com/alignsans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416145100/http:/typophile.com/alignsans "http://typophile.com/alignsans")

ChrisL
I'd say loosen up the spacing a bit, make the ear of r shorter, and make the crossbar of t shorter. They're making big white spots.

ah! Aline sounds like "a-lee-ne", it is a brazilian name.
